summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 17, 2019, scheduling a meeting titled 'Epstein update' for September 18, 2019, in the ADIC's conference room. It shows FBI coordination regarding the Epstein case shortly after his death in August 2019.

events.title: Epstein update meeting
events.description: A scheduled meeting among FBI personnel to discuss updates on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is dated September 17, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
It schedules an 'Epstein update' meeting for September 18, 2019, indicating ongoing FBI activity related to the case post-Epstein's death.
The meeting was to be held in the 'ADIC's Conference room' (likely the Assistant Director in Charge).
The email shows internal FBI coordination, with multiple recipients and carbon copies, all from FBI email addresses.
The subject and timing suggest the FBI was actively reviewing or investigating aspects of the Epstein case following his death.
